snippet.title: Ovine Replica — Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Amorous Ursidae presents its first independent visual novel.

Between turmoil and tranquility, Ovine Replica is a tale of facing heartbreak and finding fulfillment in a sundered city.

Video: Kamigigana, Matthew L.
Art: Aiyuu
Music: Matthew L.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=Amorous%20Ursidae
itch.io: https://amorous-ursidae.itch.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/vrsvsamori
